answerText: Annus Mirabilis[10] Annus Mirabilis was written by this English poet and dramatist of Absalom and Achitophel and MacFlecknoe.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Illinois A, Alabama, Yale B | 3 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this lengthy poem detailing the events of 1665 to 1666, written while its author was in western Britain attempting to escape the Great Plague of London.
